article_title: Lenoir-Rhyne readies for physician assistant program
article_text: With Lenoir-Rhyne University planning to offer more graduate programs in health sciences, two medical institutions and a few other entities in Catawba County have thrown their support behind the initiative, pledging a substantial amount of financial assistance.

article_metadata.title: Lenoir-Rhyne readies for physician assistant program | The Charlotte Observer
